title: Callie Parish Mysteries - Fran Rizer
description:
A Tisket, a Tasket, a Fancy Stolen Casket (2007)
(The first book in the Callie Parrish Mystery series)
A novel by Fran Rizer


"Colorful characters, corpses, and stolen caskets - this mystery has them all, plus a lively sleuth who manages to make funeral homes funny."
Maggie Sefton	


Bubbles meets Six Feet Under in the new Calamine Parrish mystery series.

Mortuary cosmetologist Calamine Parrish stares death in the face every day. But when she finds a hypodermic needle in the neck of an "accidental" drowning victim, and the victim's fancy casket is stolen, Callie finds herself in over her head-and in the way of a killer.

Hey Diddle Diddle, the Corpse and the Fiddle (2008)
(The second book in the Callie Parrish Mystery series)
A novel by Fran Rizer


BUBBLES MEETS SIX FEET UNDER IN THE SECOND CALLIE PARRISH MYSTERY.

Mortuary cosmetologist Callie Parrish and her friend take off for a bluegrass festival on Surcie Island. But when a fiddler turns up dead, Callie has no choice but to take center stage in the investigation.

Casket Case (2008)
(The third book in the Callie Parrish Mystery series)
A novel by Fran Rizer


When the town's beloved pharmacist is found floating face-down in his hot tub, Callie suspects foul play. But while she feels like her investigation is leading her nowhere, someone else seems to think she knows too much. All signs point to a con game gone dangerously wrong. Now it's up to Callie to catch a killer - before she winds up being fitted for her own casket.

Twinkle, Twinkle, Little Star, There's A Body In The Car (2011)
(fourth book in the Callie Parrish series)

When Callie finds a locked car with an unidentified dead man and a poisonous snake inside, she's busy caring for her sick father and helping with her brothers' weddingsÃ¢â‚¬â€too busy for any detecting.
Then Mrs. Joyner wants her deceased husband's fingerprints preserved in gold. Callie takes the prints, and the sheriff discovers Mr. Joyner isn't the man his wife thought he was.
Two men, both dead from poisoning. Callie vows not to get involved, but when her brother Frankie is poisoned, too, and the sheriff goes missing, it's up to Callie. She must catch a killerÃ¢â‚¬â€before she winds up cosmetizing the corpse of someone she loves.
